text: alm tar -ayha alrswl- 'iilaa alyhwd aladhin nuhu ean alhadith srrana bima yuthir alshaku fi nufus almwmnyn, thuma yurjaeun 'iilaa maa nuhu enh, wythdthwn srrana bima hu 'iithm wedwan wmkhalft li'amr alrswl? wa'iidha ja'ak -ayha alrswl- hwla' alyhwd li'amr min al'umur hyawk bighayr altahiat alty jaealaha allah lak thyt, fqalu: (alsam elyk) ay: almawt lk, wayaqulun fima bynhm: hla yeaqbna allah bima naqul lmhmd 'iin kan rasulana hqana, takfihim jahanam ydkhlwnha, wyqaswn hrha, fabis almrje hy
